artist: Artist: Hashiguchi Goyō; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Imai Danshi; Producer: Posthumously produced by Hashiguchi Yasuo
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: kneeling woman smoothing a kimono; grey ground
inscription: 大正九年十月 {Taishō kunen jūgatsu} (October 1920)
text: Artwork dated to October 1920 but first posthumously printed in 1953. This impression is missing the red artist seal.
title: Woman Folding a Kimono
